basics.name: Zhengwei Gong
basics.summary: Junior in Electrical & Computer Engineering at Shanghai Jiao Tong University.

highlights: Provided technical guidance on circuit analysis and simulations, assisting students in debugging and experimental design.
Demonstrated strong responsibility, communication skills, and long-term commitment in an academic setting.

skills.name: ML Training & Optimization
keywords: End-to-end PyTorch pipelines (Dataset/DataLoader, train/val loops, checkpointing, reproducibility)
Adam/SGD, LR scheduling, regularization, loss engineering (MSE/Huber, multi-task losses)

skills.name: Simulation & Experimentation
keywords: Learning-based experiments in simulated environments (CARLA, Habitat-Lab)
Evaluation with MAE/RMSE/F1 and error breakdowns

skills.name: Environment & Writing
keywords: Ubuntu-based AI development (conda, CUDA-ready PyTorch, Git, Docker, SSH)
Formal academic writing and collaborative workflows using LaTeX and Git

portfolio.name: Neural Network-based Numerical Integration
portfolio.description: Course project (MATH471: Numerical Analysis). Built neural-network-based function approximators for definite integrals with PyTorch, including data generation, training, and evaluation; analyzed stability and generalization.

portfolio.name: Machine Learning and Large-Scale Algorithm Optimization
portfolio.description: Course project (Res1102: Algorithms for Big Data). Implemented perceptron, MLP, MNIST classifier, language-ID RNNs, and a masked-attention transformer for character-level GPT.

portfolio.name: Algorithms & AI Foundations Self-Study Module
portfolio.description: Self-directed & course project (ECE477: Intro to Algorithm). Studied advanced algorithms and co-authored a structured algorithm wiki with LaTeX and Git.
